titles.title: Juneau International Airport Safety Act of 1993
Juneau International Airport Safety Act of 1993
A bill to require a study and report on the safety of the Juneau International Airport, with recommendations to Congress.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2110)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings with amendments. With written report No. 103-75.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 116.

bill.summary: 6/29/1993--Reported to Senate amended. Juneau International Airport Safety Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to study and report to specified congressional committees on the safety of aircraft approaches to the Juneau International Airport, Alaska.
